channel.title: How to invade a village?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "How to invade a village?"

item.title: Re: How to invade a village?
item.content:encoded: Invading and raiding work the same way. If you attack whoever your village is prepared to invade, then you will invade it. Otherwise, you will raid it.

item.title: How to invade a village?
item.content:encoded:
How i invade a village?
i don't want to raid, i want to invade, cause if i raid a village i will get kicked of andromeda
how i could do that?how i invade?
